titles.title: Smoke-Free Transportation Facilities Act of 1996
To prohibit smoking in any transportation facility for which Federal financial assistance is provided.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/30/1996--Introduced. Smoke-Free Transportation Facilities Act of 1996 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to: (1) require, as a condition of Federal financial assistance, that the owner or operator of a transportation facility take the necessary action to prohibit smoking in any indoor portion of the facility accessible to the general public; and (2) issue implementing regulations.
